scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist .cache .parcel-cache release && mkdir dist release
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/ && parcel watch --no-hmr src/{background.js,content-script.js,evaluate.js}
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/ && parcel build src/{background.js,content-script.js,evaluate.js} && cd dist && zip -r ../release/tms-captcha.zip *
